text:
Seven Bridges Genomics -- Cambridge, MA

http://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/44260/genomic-data-eng... http://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/44259/core-r-d-develop...

We are doing exciting things at the cutting edge of bioinformatics; see the job listings for more details. Other job postings (for scientists and non-scientists) are listed at jobs.sbgenomics.com.

H1B candidates are welcome.
